text: Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Harold Arthur Deane (1854-1908)National Register of Archives was an administrator in British India. Deane served as the first Political Agent of the Malakand in 1895Afghan Frontier: Feuding and Fighting in Central Asia, By Victoria Schofield and also as the first Chief Commissioner of the Administration, - Imperial Gazetteer of India, v. 19, p. 188. when the province was created on 9th November 1901.The History of British India: A Chronology By John F. Riddick ==References== Category:Colonial officials of British India Category:1854 births Category:1908 deaths
title: Harold Arthur Deane
